attributes.action: Longer prison sentences regarding knife crime
attributes.additional_details:
What gives the right for someone to take someone else's life away from them. Not enough is being done. Fact.
The family's are doing the longest sentence.
attributes.background:
As knife crime is on the increase. Surely something needs to be done.
Millions are being spent on policing etc.
A 50+ years sentence would reduce knife crime fact. It would save money and save lifes

rejection.details:
You may wish to sign this petition calling for a similar action: 

Minimum 10-year sentence for knife possession and 20 years for use of a knife:
https://petition.parliament.uk/petitions/580709
